page.title: 14Market Bosworth Park
page.content: {Market Bosworth Park and Arboretum.} The Park and the Arboretum are important attractions to the area,The park consists of open parkland,an arboretum,a lake,stream and an adventure-playground made from natural wood.the area is supervised by a warden Mr. Grieson.About{60,000 people visit the park per year on average often combining this with a visit to the nearby battlefield.About {100}ducks and geese will winter on the lake and rare birds have been spotted such as the green sandpiper.the lake is{10}ft deep and contains an island which gives birds more protection.The Arboretum has many species of trees,about a{100}in all with many different Oaks and Maples.The warden commented that new developments include new paths in the stewpond Covert.
